keys.string: Finally! The day is over! Time to go play some games!
Danny notices me enter his room..
Oh hey there, [NAME]! Did you enjoy the lectures today?
It was just the first day, but I noticed you were just playing games in there. What gives?
Hey! I may not seem like I’m paying attention, but I am!
He switches his attention to the game on his computer monitor.
Yeah. Amini’s a pretty good professor, but cloud computing is interesting in how I can sync my game with the cloud.
Arun’s classes are pretty fun. I always wanted to do VR, but wearing glasses makes it difficult to do that sort of stuff.
I’ve never had a class with Conrad before, but I think Machine Learning is useful for creating difficult AI in games.
Anyway, you might not see me in class that often, but keep me updated on what’s going on!
I let out a sigh as Danny’s lax nature is revealed to me.

ArrayOfString.string: [Danny][Dialog]Finally! The day is over! Time to go play some games!
[Danny][Dialog]Oh hey there, [NAME]! Did you enjoy the lectures today?
[Player][Dialog]It was just the first day, but I noticed you were just playing games in there. What gives?
[Danny][Dialog]Hey! I may not seem like I’m paying attention, but I am!
[Narrator][Dialog]He switches his attention to the game on his computer monitor.
[Danny][Option]Dang it! Not again! By the way, who are you deciding on as being your advisor?
[Danny][Dialog]Yeah. Amini’s a pretty good professor, but cloud computing is interesting in how I can sync my game with the cloud.
[Danny][Dialog]Arun’s classes are pretty fun. I always wanted to do VR, but wearing glasses makes it difficult to do that sort of stuff.
[Danny][Dialog]I’ve never had a class with Conrad before, but I think Machine Learning is useful for creating difficult AI in games.
[Danny][Dialog]Anyway, you might not see me in class that often, but keep me updated on what’s going on!
[Danny][Dialog]Anyway, you might not see me in class that often, but keep me updated on what’s going on!
[Danny][Dialog]Anyway, you might not see me in class that often, but keep me updated on what’s going on!
[Narrator][Dialog]I let out a sigh as Danny’s lax nature is revealed to me.
